synonyms: udghūrṇā—unsteadiness; vivaśa-ceṣṭā—boastful activities; divya-unmāda-nāma—named transcendental madness; virahe—in separation; kṛṣṇa-sphūrti—manifestation of Kṛṣṇa; āpanāke—oneself; kṛṣṇa-jñāna—thinking as Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "Udghūrṇā [unsteadiness] and vivaśa-ceṣṭā [boastful activities] are aspects of transcendental madness. In separation from Kṛṣṇa, one experiences the manifestation of Kṛṣṇa, and one thinks oneself to be Kṛṣṇa.
